summary: Oedipus was a famous Greek king with a sad fate. A prophecy said he would kill his father and marry his mother, bringing disaster. He was left to die as a baby but was saved and adopted. Growing up, he tried to avoid his fate but unknowingly fulfilled it. He killed his real father and married his mother, becoming king of Thebes. Later, he discovered the truth, leading to tragedy. His story teaches about human flaws and destiny. It has been told many times and inspired the idea of the Oedipus complex in psychology.
title: Oedipus
